talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Warrior Sian$
Yes? Master Archer Zenya? No, I haven't see him.
(Talk with Master Archer Zenya)

$Sorcerer Karahan$
Our relationship hasn't mature enough~ baby. Don’t be hesitate.
(Karahan gives a bullshit)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes? You have something to tell me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Archer Zenya$
{user_nick}, wait. Come here.

$Master Archer Zenya$
Are you…
(Zenya looks sharply at me and lowers his voice)
Are you, meeting a boyfriend?

$Master Archer Zenya$
Some guy told me to want to meet you …
Who's that? Do you have a relationship with him? Or, are you playing with him?

$Master Archer Zenya$
Are you playing with him? Playing!
You're meeting humans but you never know the basic words. You should at least read Oops! Goddess!.

$Master Archer Zenya$
Well… I understand that you're just underage…never know how 100-year old people think..the emotions..
Well, it's true that you are too young to know that.
<html>$Stray Heart$</html>

$Master Archer Zenya$
The guy waiting for you will be Dragon-followers Territory.
I don't have any idea why he's waiting at that kind of dark and drab place.

$Master Archer Zenya$
Anyway, just be careful. I don't want you hurt by someone because of love and parting like other senior elfs.

※ You can't continue this quest with a party.

$Sorcerer Karahan$
Cute deer~ Wait for me. Our relationship is not mature enough~
(Karahan gives a bullshit)

$???$
Urraa! Haaa!!
(One warrior is brandishing a sword passionately)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm<FONT color=#387207>{user_nick}</FONT>. Are you waiting for me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Sian$
Oh! {user_class} came here!
I, I'm Warrior Sian! I just….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it you that someone wants to meet me??</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Sian$
Oh…? Ohhh!! Are you{user_nick}?!
Wow! It's good to see you again here! It's amazing!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I was told from Zenya that you're waiting for me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Sian$
Huh? I wanted to see you..but this...
Ah… Ah, well…. I didn't say that I want to meet {user_nick}.
But…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If you don't have a business with me, I'm going.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Sian${action:Talk}
Huh?! Why did he say like that? Ah, there's misunderstanding.
I just told that I wanted to have one Archer who can have a party with me.
I didn't expect that {user_nick}is coming.

$Warrior Sian$
Oops! {user_nick}, why don't you have a party with me and go to Abyss…
(I don't have a business anymore with Warrior Sian. Let's go out of here.)

$Warrior Sian$
I'm kind of strong in Abyss? If you have a party with me...
(I don't have a business anymore with Warrior Sian. Let's go out of here.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it you that someone wants to meet me??</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorcerer Karahan$
Beau~ ti~ ful~ . The world, should be beautiful like me!
(Karahan is spelling some odd magic)

$Sorcerer Karahan$
Do I? (Karahan is at a loss for words) Ha! Why the most beautiful and handsome Karahan wants to meet you? You must have wanted to meet me! Cute deer.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Let's ignore) Why did you want to see me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorcerer Karahan${action:Talk}
You are at a loss for words because of my beauty.
Well, I understand you can't forget my beauty because I'm like a flower among a bunch of hound.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Him? Do I look same as him?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorcerer Karahan$
Whoa. Are you going to repeat that I wanted to see you? Don't be shy cutie.
But… I can know exactly that..
You look like him so much.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I haven't tried to escape from it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorcerer Karahan$
Look like same. Trying to escape from the harsh bridle of fate….
You definitely look same as him.

$Sorcerer Karahan$
In your elf words… yes, Telejia?Is it the right name?
Cutie, you're not the person who accepts your Telejia humbly.

$Sorcerer Karahan$
A bird in mockeryis trying not to here the mockery. You're like the bird. Haha.

$Sorcerer Karahan$
Connections between you are going to vanish, and the remaining is only the broken body.

$Sorcerer Karahan$
If you can accept the pain and ordeal without any doubt…
you can like like a normal elf accepting the fate. But you are not that kind of person.

$Sorcerer Karahan$
You are contemplating in the whirlpool of the harsh fate. So what are you going to do?
Are you going to accept thefateor…move forward to your own way like him?

$Sorcerer Karahan${action:Talk}
Ubensielis an uncomfortable guy. (Karahan stares at me)
He's not the person you can easily meet but….
if it is you, you can at least draw interest of him.

$Master Archer Zenya$
Came back? How was that guy?
Did he declare his love to you? As a senior, I'm telling you that our elf is….

$Master Archer Zenya$
No? …really?
Hmm… (Zenya looks disappointed) Hmm. It wasn't easy for me to send you there.
What's the problem of the warrior? Gee.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Calling
journal.contents:
Master Archer Zenya said to me that someone wants to meet me at Dragon-followers Territory.

※ You can't continue this quest with a party.

Riverwart Wharf(Riverwart Ruins) → Dragon-followers Territory
journal.destination: (1 person) Find someone at Dragon-followers Territory

journal.title: Unidentified
journal.contents:
I met Warrior Sian but he said he didn't request to meet me. I'm not sure whether it is true or not, but it seems like there's nothing to do here so let's get back.

※ You can't continue this quest with a party.

Riverwart Wharf(Riverwart Ruins) → Dragon-followers Territory
journal.destination: (1 person) Find someone at Dragon-followers Territory
journal.todo_msg: Find someone else at Dragon-followers Territory

journal.title: To Master Archer Zenya
journal.contents:
I heard the name Ubensiel from Sorcerer Karahan. I think there's something, but there's no any other information so let's get back to Master Archer Zenya.

Lotus Marsh → Master Archer Zenya
journal.todo_msg: We couldn't find someone who wants to meet you. Talk with Master Archer Zenya
